languages.text: "Матрона Белинда Трауфгольд, Лорд-капитан. Была переведена из блюстителей в обслугу покоев Вашей Светлости в звании старшего лейтенанта, в связи с возрастом и пошатнувшимся здоровьем. Но, как видите, бывших блюстителей не бывает". {n}На бескровных губах играет добродушная улыбка.{/n}

"Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Матрона Белинда Трауфгольд, Лорд-капитан. Была переведена из блюстителей в обслугу покоев Вашей Светлости в звании старшего лейтенанта, в связи с возрастом и пошатнувшимся здоровьем. Но, как видите, бывших блюстителей не бывает". {n}На бескровных губах играет добродушная улыбка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Matron Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Retired in the rank of Senior Lieutenant, but as you can see, there is no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A kindly smile stretches across the bloodless lips.{/n}

But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

"Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

languages.text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Von den Enforcern angesichts meines Alters und meiner schwindenden Gesundheit in den Rang eines leitenden Lieutenants im Quartiersstab Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} erhoben. Aber wie Ihr sehen könnt, gibt es keine ehemaligen Enforcer." {n}Ein freundliches Lächeln umspielt ihre blutleeren Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Von den Enforcern angesichts meines Alters und meiner schwindenden Gesundheit in den Rang eines leitenden Lieutenants im Quartiersstab Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} erhoben. Aber wie Ihr sehen könnt, gibt es keine ehemaligen Enforcer." {n}Ein freundliches Lächeln umspielt ihre blutleeren Lippen.{/n}

languages.text: «Belinda Traufgold, Lord Capitán. Transferida desde el personal de seguridad, con el grado de teniente veterana, al personal de los aposentos de mi{mf|lord|lady} debido a mi edad y mis problemas de salud. Pero, como puede ver, una nunca deja de ser guardia del todo». {n}Sus pálidos labios esbozan una sonrisa cordial.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Belinda Traufgold, Lord Capitán. Transferida desde el personal de seguridad, con el grado de teniente veterana, al personal de los aposentos de mi{mf|lord|lady} debido a mi edad y mis problemas de salud. Pero, como puede ver, una nunca deja de ser guardia del todo». {n}Sus pálidos labios esbozan una sonrisa cordial.{/n}

languages.text: 「ベリンダ・トラフゴールドです、ロード・キャプテン。私の年齢と健康状態の悪化を理由に、副官の階級を持つエンフォーサーから、陛下の区画のスタッフに異動になりました。だが、ご覧の通り、元エンフォーサーなどというものは存在しません」{n}彼女の血の気のない唇は、笑顔を作った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ベリンダ・トラフゴールドです、ロード・キャプテン。私の年齢と健康状態の悪化を理由に、副官の階級を持つエンフォーサーから、陛下の区画のスタッフに異動になりました。だが、ご覧の通り、元エンフォーサーなどというものは存在しません」{n}彼女の血の気のない唇は、笑顔を作った。{/n}

languages.text: “我叫贝琳达·特劳戈德，舰长大人。由于我年事已高，身体日益衰弱，我不得不离开了执法者的队伍，从中尉的职位上退了下来，成为了您普通的臣民，大人。不过如您所见，我身为执法者的本领一点都没有退步。”{n}她咧开了没有血色的嘴唇，露出了友善的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我叫贝琳达·特劳戈德，舰长大人。由于我年事已高，身体日益衰弱，我不得不离开了执法者的队伍，从中尉的职位上退了下来，成为了您普通的臣民，大人。不过如您所见，我身为执法者的本领一点都没有退步。”{n}她咧开了没有血色的嘴唇，露出了友善的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: « Belinda Rivor, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ancienne lieutenante supérieure des prévôts réaffectée au personnel de vos quartiers en raison de mon âge et de ma santé déclinante. Mais comme vous pouvez le voir, prévôt un jour, prévôt toujours, » {n}dit-elle en affichant un sourire amical de ses lèvres exsangues.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Belinda Rivor, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais comme vous pouvez le voir, prévôt un jour, prévôt toujours, » {n}dit-elle en affichant un sourire amical de ses lèvres exsangues.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, ismim Belinda Traufgold. İleri yaşım ve kötüye giden sağlığım sebebiyle kıdemli teğmen rütbesindeki infazcılar arasından {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin şahsi odasının personeline nakledildim. Ancak göreceğiniz üzere infazcılığın eskisi yenisi olmuyor." {n}Kanı çekilmiş dudaklarına dostane bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Belinda Traufgold, Lord Captain. Transferred from the enforcers with the rank of senior lieutenant to the staff of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s quarters on account of my age and declining health. But, as you can see, there's no such thing as a former enforcer." {n}A friendly smile stretches across her bloodless lips.{/n}
